name: Rock, Sail... Axe?
description:
This game was made during the Weekly Game Jam 154, which theme was "Rock Paper Scissors".

I hadn't made any games in a while and wanted to try and make something using the Vikings pack, from Polygon and thought this was a great occasion.

The core gameplay is the same as Rock Paper Scissors, with the only difference being that you're playing against an incompetent AI. Also, you use a Sail instead of Paper and an Axe instead of Scissors. Since we're delving down the rabbithole of viking tropes, winning rounds sets the beautiful scenery on fire too!

Assets used:

  • Celtic Theme, by Tom Kent
  • PR Viking font, by Peter Rempel
  • Vikings Pack, by POLYGON
